content:
Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator:
    - name: EX
      operator: not_exists
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0407
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when study includes protocol-specified study treatment
  and EX is not present
Outcome:
  Message: EX is not present in study when study includes protocol-specified study
    treatment
Rule Type: Domain Existence Check
Sensitivity: Study
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0407
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The EX domain is required for all studies that include
                  protocol-specified study treatment.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 1c
                Section: 6.1.3.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - EX

json.Description: Trigger error when study includes protocol-specified study treatment and EX is not present

Outcome.Message: EX is not present in study when study includes protocol-specified study treatment

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The EX domain is required for all studies that include protocol-specified study treatment.
